name: VesicularStomatitisTestsForVesicularStomatitisVirusAntigen
title: Vesicular stomatitis (Tests for Vesicular stomatitis virus Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Vesicular stomatitis virus Antigen in any specimen type),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Vesicular stomatitis virus Antigen),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
